ParameterAdjustmentEvent:
class ParameterAdjustmentEvent(Event):
	"""Parameter adjustment event."""
	def __init__(self, parameter: ProcessParameter, old_value: Union[str, float], new_value: Union[str, float], **kwargs):
		super().__init__("parameter_adjustment", chinese_name="参数调整", **kwargs)
		self.parameter = parameter
		self.old_value = old_value
		self.new_value = new_value
